    • Method Detail

      • setReplicationPartnerHostname

        public DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec.Builder setReplicationPartnerHostname(java.lang.String replicationPartnerHostname)
        The (earlier converged) embedded node with which the Platform Services Controller replication has to be set during convergence. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.2. If Set then the converged embedded node will be set in replication mode with this node.
        Parameters:
        replicationPartnerHostname - New value for the property.

      • setOnlyPrecheck

        public DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec.Builder setOnlyPrecheck(java.lang.Boolean onlyPrecheck)
        Flag to pass if only pre-check to be performed. This property was added in vSphere API 6.7.2. If Set will perform only pre-checks.
        Parameters:
        onlyPrecheck - New value for the property.

        public DeploymentTypeTypes.ConvergenceSpec build()
